description: A record of user clicks on a website

properties.name: _kafka_key
properties.description: The key of the Kafka message

properties.name: _kafka_topic
properties.description: The topic of the Kafka message

properties.name: _kafka_partition
properties.description: The partition of the Kafka message

properties.name: _kafka_offset
properties.description: The offset of the Kafka message

properties.name: _kafka_timestamp
properties.description: The timestamp of the Kafka message

properties.name: _kafka_timestampType
properties.description: The timestamp type of the Kafka message

properties.name: _kafka_schema_id
properties.description: The schema ID of the Kafka message value

properties.name: user_id
properties.description: The ID of the user who clicked

properties.name: username
properties.description: The username of the user who clicked

properties.name: registered_at
properties.description: The timestamp when the user registered

properties.name: first_name
properties.description: The first name of the user who clicked

properties.name: last_name
properties.description: The last name of the user who clicked

properties.name: city
properties.description: The city where the user who clicked is located

properties.name: level
properties.description: The level of the user who clicked
